data.rewards_program_description: Earn 4X points at restaurants worldwide (capped at $50,000/year, then 1X), 4X points at U.S. supermarkets (capped at $25,000/year, then 1X), 3X points on flights booked directly with airlines or AmexTravel.com, 2X points on prepaid hotels booked on AmexTravel.com, and 1X points on all other purchases.
data.rewards_expiration_detail: Points don't expire while account remains open and in good standing
data.rewards_redemption_options: Points can be redeemed for travel bookings, gift cards, statement credits, transfer to airline/hotel partners, or pay with points at checkout with select merchants
data.alternative_payment_plans: Plan It: Split purchases of $100+ into monthly installments with fixed fee; Pay Over Time: Option to carry balance with interest up to limit

benefits.benefit_description: Up to $120 annual dining credit ($10 monthly) at Grubhub, The Cheesecake Factory, Goldbelly, Wine.com, Five Guys
Up to $120 in annual Uber Cash ($10 monthly) for Uber Eats orders or Uber rides in U.S.
Up to $100 annual Resy Credit ($50 semi-annually) for U.S. Resy restaurants
Up to $84 annual Dunkin' Credit ($7 monthly)
The Hotel Collection: $100 credit for eligible charges on stays of 2+ nights
Choice of card design: Gold, Rose Gold, or Limited-Edition White Gold

incentives.incentive_description: 60,000 Membership Rewards points after spending $6,000 in first 6 months
20% back on eligible restaurant purchases worldwide (up to $100)
